name: mail-manager
description: Local email manager with AI-powered classification using Ollama

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run tauri dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run tauri build
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
